title: Ownership: The ownership of such LOS shall vest by provision, in a deed of conveyance, in all the property owners on account of whose holdings the LOS is assigned
clause_text: Ownership: The ownership of such LOS shall vest by provision, in a deed of conveyance, in all the property owners on account of whose holdings the LOS is assigned.
